title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 21 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 21 2021
description:
Buck predicts what we'll see over the next six weeks. Get ready for more authoritarian madness from the left, but be optimistic. Notice how the Fauciites don't even pretend they can "flatten the curve" anymore. Curious about the Siege of Malta, Buck talks about his love of ancient history. Buck's personal story of overcoming a speech impediment, to hosting the most-listened to talk radio show. His parents were great, he notes, and advises you to "stay on it and believe in your kids" to possibly have similarly good results in tough spots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
